phrases: Do you really want to go out with Seiko-chan?
How could I say no when her eyes were all sparkly like that?!
You always say stuff like that.
You say you are acting cool, but maybe you are just indecisive.
You are just taking it out on me because you are not popular.
What do you mean I am not popular?!
He does not see you as a woman.
She likes me so much, she could not control herself and suddenly kissed me.
All it took was a minute.
It is a shame, huh, Koizumi.
As Japan is such a small country, compact things have now become a necessity.
The era of small men has finally arrived!
This has all gone straight to his head.
Honestly, that idiot has gotten too carried away.
Well, any guy kissed by a girl that cute would get a little cocky.
Plus, while most girls call Otani cute,
That is why he is particularly happy.
She is cute, but she sure is bold.
That is the first time I have ever seen someone kiss right in front of me.
You have had your physical examination?
Um... sorry for surprising you yesterday.
After seeing Otani-senpai, I just could not help myself.
I am getting all weak just remembering it...
Whenever I think about someone I like, my mind goes blank.
And then my body starts moving by itself.
I am going to try my best from now on!
If you do not mind, please help me, okay, Senpai?
I will be counting on you, okay!
That girl seems to use a strange technique.
A technique to grab guy's hearts.
While she is spacing out, she emits a ton of pheromones.
That is a substance that does not exist within my body.
In other words, she is sexy.
Well, she might not even be Otani-kun's type...
Risa, you give it your best too.
Why do I have to give it my best?
And just what am I giving my best for?!
You are helping with the physicals are not you, Chiharu-chan?
Risa, have your height measured already.
That Seiko-chan is small and cute...
Otani's probably happier that someone like her likes him, rather than a giant like me.
Not like I would ever admit that to anyone, though!
You can gain 2 millimeters just by wearing socks.
I am in a good mood today, so I will not let the little things bother me.
Who are you calling little pervert?!
You are as cool as always!
This is no time to be growing taller, Risa!
You think I am doing it on purpose?!
If you do not do something, Otani-kun and that girl really will get together.
He can do what he likes.
It was your fault for spacing out.
What if I would hit my chin and ended up with a big split in it like some foreigner?!
You would be able to stick memos in it.
If you ruin this manly face Seiko-chan will be sad.
You sure are a happy guy.
With this charm from the giant goddess, maybe I will grow taller too.
She is known as Koizumi Risa.
Although she appears to be an ordinary human,
You seem to be in a pretty good mood.
Otani-senpai is really cool, is not he!
I will take you to the infirmary!
Otani, who is that cute girl?
Stuck in the infirmary with a devilish woman who does not care what others think...
Senpai, do not you think it is hot in here?
And then Seiko slowly undoes her buttons, one by one...
What the heck are you saying?!
That girl seems really cute, right?
But everyone gets fooled by that.
She says she does not like her real name,
Do not you think it is hot in here?
But her real name is Kotobuki Seishiro.
The sports festival is coming up soon, huh?
I think the cheer squad is recruiting.
I-I think I will sign up.
If you are signing up, I-I will sign up too.
What does the cheer squad do?
What is so funny, you guys?!
I cannot hold it in anymore!
I have been holding it in this whole time!
I am going to hit you!
I am going to hit all of you!
This kind of thing happens all the time.
How can this kind of thing happen all the time?
It is taken years off my life.
But for some reason, I feel relieved.
Are you going to go watch basketball practice again today?
So you really do like Otani-senpai...
It is not like I am going to watch Otani.
I am just keeping Nobu-chan company while she waits for her boyfriend.
But you gave him a wristband as a present, did not you?
This is the first I have heard of it.
You would not give something like that to someone you did not like right?
I do not really think that matters.
I mean, if that were the case, is not it even more weird for me to like Otani-senpai?
But Seiko-chan, you do not look like a boy at all.
I have never thought of myself as a boy.
I am sure God just put me in the wrong body.
Since that day in the infirmary, I feel like he is been avoiding me.
Does he think I am disgusting?
Uh... I think he is just confused.
I am sure everything will work out.
I had no idea you liked him, and asked you to help me.
From now on, we are rivals.
But, I am not going to lose to you!
I will use my charm and pheromones to make Otani-senpai fall for me.
You would not give something like that to someone you did not like, right?
Geez, Risa, you are too concerned about your height.
It is only 2cm, yet you are this depressed about it.
Do you know why it is a big problem?
A guy who is shorter than me?
I came to play with you.
No, what is with that outfit?
I joined the sports festival cheer squad.
We decided on cheer girl uniforms!
I thought it was super cute, so I had to show you right away!
A guy falling for another guy...
That would make things really difficult.
But he is trying so hard...
Meanwhile I am sitting here worrying about our height difference...
Seiko-chan, you will be in the same squad as us right?
Otani-senpai will be with us too, so I will do my best!
Say, why do you like Otani-kun?
Would not you prefer someone stronger and more manly?
I think Otani-senpai is really manly and cool.
The way he helped me on my first day was just amazing!
Height is not an issue so you can join even if you are short.
He is a nice guy, after all.
Nobu-chan, I will be going on ahead, okay.
So you are not really going out with Otani-kun, right?
See, they cannot be going out.
Otani would not date a huge girl like that, after all.
What do you mean they cannot be going out?!
How can you say such rude things without knowing how hard other people are trying?!
I do not really think they were...
But... now that you mention it...
It is weird, is not it?
Me saying that I like Otani-senpai...
But, even if I confess to Otani-senpai...
I will say this, at least.
And I do not think you are disgusting either.
But if you want me to be your boyfriend, that might be a bit of a problem.
Ch-Cheer girls are kind of cute, huh...
Can I still visit your classroom?
I will visit every day in my cheer uniform!
The girls in our squad will be wearing boys' uniforms,
Unlike me, you are a girl Koizumi-senpai.
You really could become his girlfriend.
If you are always so concerned about height, you will not find love.
I think I am going to try being a bit more honest.
He fits snugly in my arms.
Wh-Wh-What do you think you are doing?!
It does not matter if I can carry him in my arms.
It does not matter if he is shorter than me.
Now, let us put him in a cheer girl uniform!
Koizumi, is there someone you like?
